thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com
thread.title: Mark Hadley
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Mark Hadley

author: Mark Hadley
title: Mark Hadley
text:
This was my first experience with Frames Direct and I was a little nervous due to a couple of negative reviews in their past and just the worry about doing something so technical and detail oriented-like this, on line. The order process was very straight forward and easy to understand and follow. Sarah, an Optician in customer service followed my order every step of the way. I qualified for a very good discount on the lenses bringing the total cost far below what any other company was offering. The frames and lenses I chose are a very difficult to execute properly and Frames Direct did it flawlessly and in a timely manner. My experience was so good I just placed an order for RX sunglasses and I can hardly wait to get them. I highly recommend Frames Direct for prescription eyeglasses and sun glasses. Just follow the directions properly and they do the rest !
Mark Hadley
Marion, MA
